description: The ODC_BASIC table contains the basic information for the order context record. These include record status, logical/physical owner, record type, status, etc.

columns.name: ORDER_CONTEXT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the order context record, which contains information about when orders are intended to be used.

columns.name: ODC_RECORD_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The type category number for the order context record.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


User created context


Surgical/Invasive


Procedure order context

columns.name: ODC_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The status category number for the order context record.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Active


Active-Completed


Auto-Completed


Expired


Canceled

columns.name: ODC_PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: PAT_VISIT_CSN
columns.description: This item stores the contact serial number (CSN) of the visit that the order context is linked to.

columns.name: HOLDING_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
The pend reason category ID for the order context record, which indicates the reason the record was created.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: LAST_ORDER_ADDED_DT
columns.description: The most recent date when an order was associated with the order context record.

columns.name: LAST_ORDER_RLSD_DT
columns.description: The most recent date when an order associated with this order context record was activated.

columns.name: OVERRIDE_START_DT
columns.description: The date the original surgical visit associated with this order context record was cancelled.

columns.name: INACTIVE_DT
columns.description: The date the context record was set to an inactive status.
